eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020, EU Structural Funds, Creative Europe, COST, EIP Agri, BBI, HR Excellence in Research from the European Commission, EURAXESS.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
Aberystwyth University (AU) is an University established for the people of Wales as the first Welsh University.  
It possesses a long and distinguished record of undertaking teaching and cutting edge research that has been recognised as being world leading or internationally excellent in terms of originality, significance and rigour.
relevant_communication: Aberystwyth University had involvement in numerous Framework Programme projects - it has hosted 4 ERC grants and currently hosts 17 on-going MSCA projects and has involvement in 63 FP7 and Horizon2020 projects.  It has central service staff with experience in dealing with the EU Commission that can provide support on IPR, contractual, and financial aspects and facilitate the work of the project consortium and the exploitation of outputs.  AU also hosts an EURAXESS Local Contact Point, so can provide the best possible support to internationally mobile academics in furtherance of the aims of the European Research Area.  In addition AU has gained and successfully retained the award of HR Excellence in Research from the European Commission. AU also leads or partners on a number of ERDF, ESF and INTERREG ESIF projects.
